participant_1.background:
I have my number and my freedom.
I enjoy watching my favorite childhood cartoons.
I like to watch YouTube videos of other people barbecuing while I eat my food in the car.
I am trying to improve my relationships with the people I love.
i listen to podcasts.

participant_2.background:
I put on my favorite pair of jeans made from recycled plastic bottles.
I enjoy playing soccer with my nieces and nephews.
I like to go to YouTube to watch funny videos with my nephews.
i wait tables.
i own two boxer dogs.

content.text: Not bad! I'm trying to improve my relationships with the people I love, but it's hard.
Oh yeah, I can understand that. I'm always trying to be a better aunt to my nieces and nephews.
That's great! What do you like to do with them?
We like to play soccer, watch funny videos on YouTube, and go to the park.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love playing soccer too.
Me too! I used to play on a team when I was younger.
That's awesome! I never played on a team, but I love playing in the backyard.
Well, if you're ever in my neck of the woods, we can play sometime!
I would love that! Thanks for the invite!
No problem! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a great day!
